name: Pipe Dream (itch) (Dustin.Brown, KateCartwright)
description:
Move your character through the road of life, leaving your home and seeking to make a life of your own. Get as far as you can and gain independence, and when your money runs out, go home to mommy and daddy and get a lone from the bank of parents.

Try hard enough, run far enough, and get lucky enough, and you may just earn yourself a home of your own!

Controller:

LTrigger & RTrigger to move

A to Jump

B to slide

Keyboard:

A&D to move

W to jump

S to slide

Dance pad:

Left and Right to move

Forward to jump

Back to slide
